com.inrix.sdk.utils

Class InrixDateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.utils.InrixDateUtils

  • public class InrixDateUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains static methods for converting dates to and from formatted strings.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getDateFromString

        public static java.util.Date getDateFromString(java.lang.String str)
                                        throws java.text.ParseException
        Parses the date as a string and returns the date object. The String must be in INRIX time format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'. The time zone is UTC.
        Parameters:
        str - The date as a string in INRIX time format.
        Returns:
        The converted date.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - when str is not in the correct format.

      • getStringFromDate

        public static java.lang.String getStringFromDate(java.util.Date date)
        Converts the specified date to an INRIX time format string. This format is required for INRIX server requests.
        Parameters:
        date - The date to be converted.
        Returns:
        The date formatted as "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", or null if date is null.

      • getStringFromDateUtc

        public static java.lang.String getStringFromDateUtc(java.util.Date date)
        Converts the specified UTC date to an INRIX time format string. This format is required for INRIX server requests.
        Parameters:
        date - The UTC date to be converted.
        Returns:
        The date formatted as "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", or null if date is null.

      • getCSTimeFormatFromMS

        public static java.lang.String getCSTimeFormatFromMS(long timeMS)
        Converts the the date in milliseconds to an Android format.
        Parameters:
        date - The date in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The date formatted as "yyyy-MM-dd'T'kk:mm:ssz".

      • getTimeFormatFromMs

        public static java.lang.String getTimeFormatFromMs(java.lang.String format,
                                   long timeMs)
        Converts the the date in milliseconds to the specified format.
        Parameters:
        format - The format to convert the date into.
        date - The date in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The date formatted according to the format string.
